channel.title: Aspen Comics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Aspen Comics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mythos Studios Reveals Its ‘Ekos’ Movie Comic-Con Teaser (Exclusive)
item.description: The early first-look was intended to be just for the convention, but the strong response convinced the team at David Maisel’s Mythos to reconsider.
